title: Cant use old email to create a new acc with?
body: So earlier today i changed my old accounts email address so i could create a new acc for my twitch streams since i wanted the name to be the same and it says the email is in use even though i already verified the new email and now the old one is no longer being used...halp?{{champion:32}}

replies.body: You can sign up with a new account using a temporary address, then change it to your old one through the [account management ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751934-General-Account-Information)page.   You can also reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you have any issues with that.  We're happy to help!
